name: Republic Of Noodles by Lemon Tree

A must visit place when you're in Goa. Had my first meal there and it set a really high benchmark for me. Had a beer, Grilled fish wrapped in banana leaf & Udon Noodles with steamed chicken. The grilled fish was so flavourful and aromatic. And the udon noodles were very satiating. The great ambience and the instrumental music is just cherry on top. Had a really good experience..
9/10

Republic of Noodles at Lemon Tree Amarante in Candolim, Goa, stands out as a vibrant culinary haven, seamlessly blending delectable pan-Asian cuisine with a lively atmosphere. Boasting an exceptional live music experience as its unique selling proposition (USP), this restaurant captures the essence of Goa's eclectic spirit. The combination of great live music and impressive interiors creates an unforgettable dining experience.

Upon entering Republic of Noodles, the first thing that captures your attention is the ambiance. The interiors are a seamless fusion of contemporary design and traditional elements, creating an inviting and aesthetically pleasing atmosphere. The use of warm tones, ambient lighting, and tasteful decor contributes to a welcoming and relaxed environment.

The restaurant's layout is well-thought-out, providing both intimate corners for a romantic dinner and more open spaces for larger gatherings. The attention to detail in the decor, including artwork and subtle cultural references, adds a layer of authenticity to the dining experience. The seating arrangement ensures that every diner has a comfortable and enjoyable space to savor their meal.

The true highlight of Republic of Noodles, however, lies in its exceptional live music performances. The restaurant has successfully carved a niche for itself by curating a diverse range of musical talents, enhancing the overall dining experience. Whether it's soulful acoustic tunes or energetic live bands, the music complements the ambiance without overpowering it, striking a perfect balance.

The live music acts not only entertain but also add a dynamic element to the dining experience. The carefully curated selection of artists ensures that there's something for everyone, enhancing the restaurant's appeal to a broad spectrum of patrons. This commitment to providing quality live music sets Republic of Noodles apart from other dining establishments in the area.

Moving on to the culinary offerings, Republic of Noodles excels in delivering a pan-Asian menu that is both diverse and flavorful. The kitchen prides itself on using fresh, high-quality ingredients to create dishes that showcase the rich tapestry of Asian flavors. From Thai curries to Japanese sushi, each dish reflects a commitment to authenticity and culinary excellence.

The menu caters to various dietary preferences, offering a range of vegetarian, vegan, and non-vegetarian options. Standout dishes include the aromatic Thai green curry, perfectly seasoned sushi rolls, and the flavorful stir-fried noodles. The chefs exhibit a commendable mastery of flavors, ensuring that each bite is a delightful journey through the diverse landscapes of Asian cuisine.

The service at Republic of Noodles deserves special mention for its efficiency and attentiveness. The staff is well-trained, friendly, and knowledgeable about the menu, providing recommendations tailored to individual preferences. The seamless coordination between the kitchen and the front-of-house staff contributes to a smooth and enjoyable dining experience.

In terms of pricing, Republic of Noodles positions itself as a mid-range dining option, offering good value for the quality of food and entertainment provided. While it may not be the most budget-friendly option in Candolim, the overall experience justifies the cost, making it a reasonable investment for those seeking a memorable dining experience.

In conclusion, Republic of Noodles at Lemon Tree Amarante, Candolim, Goa, emerges as a culinary gem that successfully marries great live music with impressive interiors. The ambiance sets the stage for a delightful dining experience, while the live music acts elevate it to a memorable affair. With a diverse and flavorful pan-Asian menu, attentive service, and a commitment to providing top-notch entertainment, Republic of Noodles stands out as a must-visit destination for those seeking a culinary journey infused with a touch of musical magic in the heart of Goa.
